text: Get Blake! (formerly Blake and the Aliens) is a French-American animated television series. It was created by Antonie Guilbaud. The series was made by Marathon Media and Nickelodeon Productions. The series was broadcast on both Gulli and Nickelodeon in France. The series is about Blake Meyers, an adventurous boy who is destined to one day become a Space Ranger who protects humanity from alien squirrels called "Squaliens". The alien squirrels are sent back in time to prevent Blake from ever becoming the adult hero == References == Category:Nicktoons Category:French television series Category:2010s American children's television series Category:2015 American television series debuts Category:2015 American television series endings
title: Get Blake!
